snippet: JACKTER--Doris G. 3/3/23 - 8/16/13 Happy Birthday, Mom! You were the Universe's Gift to Me & will Remain in My Heart Forever--Especially each March 3rd. You now have 3 Beautiful Great-Grand-Dtrs: Lily Leah, who you met so briefly; sister, Margot Nicole, (For Poppa Norman); & Allison's Dtr, Your Namesake Danica Morgan 10 mos ago. How you would Love them all! Still bring Roses & Balloons, but now, to "new place" I go for our "visits". "No Day Shall Erase You From the Memory of Time" Virgil. Your Loving Daughter, "MAR" 1/3
lead_paragraph: JACKTER--Doris G. 3/3/23 - 8/16/13 Happy Birthday, Mom! You were the Universe's Gift to Me & will Remain in My Heart Forever--Especially each March 3rd. You now have 3 Beautiful Great-Grand-Dtrs: Lily Leah, who you met so briefly; sister, Margot Nicole, (For Poppa Norman); & Allison's Dtr, Your Namesake Danica Morgan 10 mos ago. How you would Love them all! Still bring Roses & Balloons, but now, to "new place" I go for our "visits". "No Day Shall Erase You From the Memory of Time" Virgil. Your Loving Daughter, "MAR" 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  JACKTER, DORIS G
